name: Open Cross Style A
description: Cross A is ¾” in diameter. Cast in sterling silver, it is plain on one side with a small wolf’s head on the back. Your cross arrives on a black chord, in an indigo bag, with a gift card and a brief story about the cross.

name: Open Cross Style B
description: Cross B is 1/¼” in diameter. It is hand cast in sterling silver. It is plain on the front. There is a small a wolf’s head on the back. Your Open Cross Arrives on a black chord, in an indigo bag, with a gift card and a brief story about the cross. If you would prefer to pay by check please contact our office at 214.485.1982. Allow a minimum of two weeks for delivery.

name: Open Cross Style C
description: Cross C is 1/¼” in diameter. Cast in sterling silver, on the front side are the words "I AM ALWAYS". This is a reminder that God is always with us. There is a small wolf’s head on the back. Your Open Cross Arrives on a black chord, in an indigo bag, with a gift card and a brief story about the cross. If you would prefer to pay by check please contact our office at 214.485.1982. Allow a minimum of two weeks for delivery.
